definition[0]: a container with a narrow top for keeping liquids in, usually made of plastic or glass
definition[1]: the amount of liquid that a bottle contains
example[2]: Between us, we drank three bottles of wine.
definition[2]: a container for babies to drink from, with a rubber part on top that they suck, or the milk contained in this bottle
example[3]: My first baby just wouldn’t take a bottle at all.
definition[3]: courage to do something that is dangerous or unpleasant
example[4]: I never thought she’d have the bottle to do it!
definition[4]: to put a liquid, especially wine or beer, into a bottle after you have made it
example[5]: The whisky is bottled here before being sent abroad.
definition[5]: to put vegetables or fruit into special glass containers in order to preserve them
